name: xexr-marketplace
description: Personal plugins and skills for Claude Code

plugins.name: identity
plugins.description: A system for intentional identity change - transformation sessions, daily interrupts, and weekly synthesis

plugins.name: design-to-beads
plugins.description: Convert design documents, PRDs, and task lists into beads issues with lossless conversion and validated dependencies

plugins.name: review-documentation
plugins.description: Multi-LLM documentation review for catching inconsistencies, codebase mismatches, and gaps with parallel Opus/GPT/Gemini dispatch

plugins.name: review-implementation
plugins.description: Multi-LLM implementation review for verifying code matches spec, completion tracking, and gap identification with parallel Opus/GPT/Gemini dispatch

plugins.name: beads-upstream-sync
plugins.description: Fork maintenance for beads (steveyegge/beads) - upstream sync, cherry-pick management, binary rebuild, and branch cleanup

plugins.name: gastown-upstream-sync
plugins.description: Fork maintenance for gastown (steveyegge/gastown) - upstream sync, cherry-pick management, binary rebuild, formula sync, and branch cleanup

plugins.name: gastown-rig-setup
plugins.description: Add Git repositories as Gas Town rigs with Dolt-native beads integration, including .beads/ seeding to work around the database naming bug
